subject: Domestic Violence
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Joe Torre's Safe at Home Foundation is teaming up with Nivea for an upcoming fund-raising event and Nivea's new "sensual" advertising campaign is raising eyebrows.
snippet: Joe Torre's Safe at Home Foundation is teaming up with Nivea for an upcoming fund-raising event and Nivea's new "sensual" advertising campaign is raising eyebrows.
